scripts.synth:watch:rustSynth: cd app/sound/rust-synth && cargo watch -w src -s "wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir build --release"
scripts.synth:watch:sampleProcessor: cd app/sound/rust-sample-processor && cargo watch -w src -s "wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir build --release"
scripts.synth:watch: concurrently "npm run synth:watch:rustSynth" "npm run synth:watch:sampleProcessor" "npm run synth:watch:worklet"
scripts.synth:build:rustSynth: cd app/sound/rust-synth && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir build --release
scripts.synth:build:sampleProcessor: cd app/sound/rust-sample-processor && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir build --release
scripts.synth:build: npm run synth:build:rustSynth && npm run synth:build:sampleProcessor && npm run synth:build:worklet
